entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel's is a location where Harry and his family are being moved to for protection.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who know Ron's location and will target the family.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend whose location is known to Death Eaters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who needs to talk to Ollivander and Griphook.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is a person who is injured and will be moved to Muriel's.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a person who is injured and will be moved to Muriel's.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person who has given Skele-Gro to Griphook.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is Harry's family member who looks startled when Harry says 'No'.

entities.name: dads secret-keeper
entities.description: Dad's Secret-Keeper is a position held by someone in the family.

entities.name: fidelius charm
entities.description: Fidelius Charm is a spell that protects Harry and his family.

relationships.description: Death Eaters will target the family because they know Ron's location.
Fleur has given Skele-Gro to Griphook.
Harry needs to talk to Ollivander.
Harry needs to talk to Griphook.
Bill is the one who holds the position of Dad's Secret-Keeper.
Fidelius Charm protects Harry and his family.
Harry needs Griphook and Ollivander to be protected with him.
Ollivander will be moved to Muriel's.
Griphook will be moved to Muriel's.
